A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: this movie was so disappointing ... the story is a disaster\, there was no closing to the various stories that had already been established in the previous movie\, I feel there were so many opportunities to give the fans what they wanted and in exchange they mocked them\, it was as if they intentionally decided to prove that they would discard the entire universe created and developed through so many years\, maybe for people not close to the saga it will be an entertaining movie\, but for the fans it will simply be a sad farewell to a beloved universe.
